description:
##This package disables Skype updates via a kludge. Updates will be handled by Chocolatey only.

##Uninstalling the package will re-enable normal Skype updates (as well as Chocolatey).

REF: https://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/skype/forum/skype_windesk-skype_startms-skype_installms/how-to-turn-off-skype-automatic-updates-on-pc/cf980eed-d9be-422c-bf0f-3a3871325b26

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/disable-skype-updates-winconfig/readme.md)**

***
**Click here to [Patreon-ize](https://www.patreon.com/bcurran3) the package maintainer.**
***
summary: This package disables Skype updates (via kludge).
author: bcurran3
